sn17.24:1.3: saddha bhikkhave upasika ekam dhitaram piyam manapam evam samma ayacamana ayaceyya:
sn17.24:1.4: ‘tadisa, ayye, bhavahi yadisa khujjuttara ca upasika velukandakiya ca nandamata’ti.
sn17.24:1.5: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savikanam upasikanam, yadidam khujjuttara ca upasika velukandakiya ca nandamata.
sn17.24:1.6: Sace kho tvam, ayye, agarasma anagariyam pabbajasi;
sn17.24:1.7: tadisa, ayye, bhavahi yadisa khema ca bhikkhuni uppalavanna cati.
sn17.24:1.8: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savikanam bhikkhuninam, yadidam khema ca bhikkhuni uppalavanna ca.
sn17.24:1.9: Ma ca kho tvam, ayye, sekham appattamanasam labhasakkarasiloko anupapunatuti.
sn17.24:1.10: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhunim sekham appattamanasam labhasakkarasiloko anupapunati, so tassa hoti antarayaya.
